sentences.sContent: These songs are full of cordiality and geniality towards children and juveniles evidencing the interests and imaginations of naïve children.
sentences.sContent_eng: These songs are full of cordiality and geniality towards children and juveniles evidencing the interests and imaginations of naïve children.
sentences.sCn: 在歌曲中充满真挚与亲切，突出了孩子童稚般的情趣和意境。

words.tran: 亲切的，友好的；和蔼的；适宜的
